item.title: Monitoring Applications with Prometheus + Grafana + Spring Boot Actuator
item.description: Monitoring is often critical in enterprise-level applications. Monitoring can help us prevent failures, predict trends, alert when thresholds are reached, and provide more information to troubleshoot production problems. If we don’t know how our program is running, it will take more time to troubleshoot when there is an accident in the online system.
